item.title: U.N. Inquiry Says Israel Is Committing Genocide, and Trump Threatens Crackdown on Liberal Groups
Federal Reserve to Meet Under Cloud of Trump’s Attacks
item.description: Stephen Miran and Lisa Cook will both cast votes at the central bank’s meeting on Wednesday, where policymakers are expected to lower interest rates.

item.title: Kennedy Says He Won’t Take Away Vaccines. Don’t Believe Him.
item.description: A meeting of a C.D.C. advisory committee could restrict vaccine access.

item.title: F.B.I. Agents Fired by Patel Speak Out on ‘Broken’ Trust
item.description: The two agents’ accounts offer an inside view of a bureau buffeted by politics and upheaval, adding to the scrutiny of the F.B.I. director as he prepa...

item.title: 20 Years Ago, Alinea Electrified Chicago Dining. Does It Still Matter?
item.description: At this famously innovative restaurant, our critic finds a mix of thought-provoking experiments and empty spectacle.
